control.visible: !Container.Content(episodes) + !Container.Content(albums) + !Container.Content(artists) + !Container.Content(songs) + !Container.Content(addons) + ![Container.Content(movies) + StringCompare(Window(Home).Property(MenuSection),programs)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(ChannelName)) + IsEmpty(ListItem.ChannelName) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Artist) + [IsEmpty(ListItem.Episode) | [!IsEmpty(ListItem.Episode) + ListItem.IsFolder]] | Window.IsVisible(script-ExtendedInfo Script-VideoList.xml)

!Container.Content(episodes) + !Container.Content(albums) + !Container.Content(artists) + !Container.Content(songs) + !Container.Content(addons) + ![Container.Content(movies) + StringCompare(Window(Home).Property(MenuSection),programs)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Property(ChannelName)) + IsEmpty(ListItem.ChannelName) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Artist) + [IsEmpty(ListItem.Episode) | [!IsEmpty(ListItem.Episode) + ListItem.IsFolder]] | Window.IsVisible(script-ExtendedInfo Script-VideoList.xml)
